name: Eberharter Theresia
description:
This text please under welcomes:

The house is in the quiet sunniest location
in Ramsau -- Bichl
in the vacation region Hippach and surroundings.

You can go directly from the house to the sunbathing Alpine pasture, Koatahorn Alpine pasture, Brindlingalm Alpine pasture, inn Steinerkogel etc. in summer.

The experience swimming pool in Hippach is approx. 3 km from the house away.

Weiters is a minigolf course, tennis courts, Ziller promenade, Skating train and much mountain-bike routes in the next proximity.

Many guest restaurants with a knownly good kitchen are surroundings nearby.
Vacation dwelling
The vacation dwelling has a garden and is for 1 -3 persons
 1 double room
From pulling couch in the living room
The bedlinen as well as the complete kitchen facilities inclusive microwave. 
 SAT TV plant and W local area network on enquiry.
Check in 15.00 Uhr - Check out 11.00 Uhr

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
cosy appartement with 2 bedrooms, livingroom, kitchen, bathroom, WC, shower, big lounge, balcony, Sat-TV, seperate WC, parquet floor in each room, 
price for more than 2 people on request
